hackathon-judges.judge-role: Senior Software Engineer at HP Cloud Services
President at YellowFin Strategy + Design, E.A.S.T. Artist

hackathon-eligibility: All are welcome and eligible to participate in this challenge.
hackathon-requirements: All app submissions should follow these requirements:

hackathon-prizes.prize-content: Winning team members will each receive a SXSW Interactive Badge (up to four total.)
Runner-ups will receive their choice of paintings donated by local Austin artists.
BigMedium has offered four tickets to their fundraiser at the WEST Group Show opening and catalog premiere. Food, drinks, music and art galore!
One month of dedicated work space in the GoLab Gallery located in downtown Austin, TX.

hackathon-location-google-maps: https://maps.google.com/?q=621 East 6th Street, Austin, TX 78702, USA

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: Should be extremely easy to use for non-tech savvy artists and fans.

Extra points and consideration for all submissions that make use of a cross-device platform such as Apache Cordova (
)
Submissions should all follow the app guidelines and make use of sample data and provided API's.

hackathon-description-header: The goal of this hackathon is to create a mobile app that helps local artists list their works, and people more effectively share the works with their network of art-appreciating friends and family.
